item.description:
DO NOT USE THE INFO/MAP BUTTON FOR DIRECTIONS:
instead: http://www.google.com...

For those who miss the good ol' days of sign waving at the intersection of DW Highway and Spit Brook Road, and for our new friends who want a taste of this - we will gather at Barnes and Noble (we may have to park a few cars elsewhere - like back into the larger parking areas adjacent - a judgement call for that time) to wave signs and hand out lit to anybody in a car stopped at the light - who wants to know more.

This has been a very successful venue for us in the past and since so many people have asked about it - thanks - we will do this on Sunday just before gathering at exit 6 Welcome Center for canvassing.
item.name: Pre-canvassing sign wave
